    %% table name: accounts
    Account {
        integer id  
        string email  
        datetime created_at  
        datetime updated_at  
    }

    %% table name: comments
    Comment {
        integer id  
        text content  
        datetime created_at  
        datetime updated_at  
    }

    %% table name: creators
    Creator {
        integer id  
        string name  
        datetime created_at  
        datetime updated_at  
    }

    %% table name: entries
    Entry {
        integer id  
        integer account_id  
        integer creator_id  
        string entryable_type  
        integer entryable_id  
        datetime created_at  
        datetime updated_at  
    }

    %% table name: messages
    Message {
        integer id  
        string subject  
        text body  
        datetime created_at  
        datetime updated_at  
    }

    Account ||--o{ Entry : "HM:entries, BT:account"
    Comment ||--o| Entry : "HO:entry"
    Entry }o--|| Creator : "BT:creator"
    Entry }o--|| Entryable : "BT:entryable"
    Message ||--o| Entry : "HO:entry"
